unnormalised: RBI announced a new set of guidelines for linking Aadhaar numbers to bank accounts. Apparently, your Acct no. with ICICI might not be enough anymore! Sources say that if you don't link your 12-digit Aadhaar ID to your account by 31/12/2024, your transactions could face delays. Some are calling it "Aadhaar-geddon," while others are simply saying, "Yeh toh hona hi tha!"
